plugin.name: LazySearch2
plugin.title: LazySearch2
plugin.desc: Lazy Search Music is a plugin that lets you search for music without having to multi-tap each letter in the search text you're after, and displays search results "as you type". This plugin works with Squeezeboxes and Transporters when using a remote control featuring number keys, and doesn't affect the operation of the Controller.
plugin.creator: Stuart Hickinbottom
